QuestData.Title: The Name Never Spoken
QuestData.Description: Did my drought work? You spoke with one of them?$B$BThen you know what to do. The name of their elemental master is written on three firestones scattered throughout the Inferno. Examine each of these stones and we will have the name we need.$B$BHurry! Your precious forest burns!
QuestData.LogDescription: Assemble the true name by examining the three Firestones in the Inferno.
